summary: \"Master Alchemy\" includes recipes for some of the most powerful potions in Skyrim. The book is located at the Alchemist\'s Shack. This book also improves your alchemy skill.
descriptionHtml:
\"Master Alchemy\" includes recipes for some of the most powerful potions in Skyrim. The book is located at the Alchemist\'s Shack. This book also improves your alchemy skill. I\'ve included a few screenshots, although there are a few more pages that I didnt take pictures of. The last page of potions are all of the potions in the game with 5 effects. That is the maximum number of effects per any one potion, and those potions will increase your alchemy skill the fastest.

This book does not include all possible potions, just a selection of a few of the best potions you can make. If you would like me to add more potion recipes or books, I can do that. Just let me know.

Also, I\'m open to suggestions for improvement. Remember to endorse it if you like it. Thanks!
author: lojames
